captions.text: This is already the fifth time this year. I'm traveling down to Patagonia.
This year is very special.
Because the movie is finished and I felt like we should show it in El Chaltén where it was shot.
The film shows what's been happening in Patagonia over the last few years,
and what we experienced there. Because of my contribution to the film it portrays the real me and also shows the reality of...
what happened down there over the last three years. I'm extremely excited.
Because of the way I was brought up I was always busy, always out and about, always in the mountains.
I have this image in my head of myself climbing a high-alpine granite wall wearing this enormous red helmet.
That's my first memory.
I immediately recognized his huge talent. He had a great sense of balance and no fear whatsoever.
I saw right away how well he moved on the rock face. Unbelievable!
Before he installed the climbing wall in his room he used to boulder under the table.
I always sat there watching.
It kept him busy for hours.
I think if you like something, you automatically try to get better at it.
Back then I told him he'd be a world champion one day.
GOAL: WORLD CHAMPION I wasn't wrong.
David Lama from Austria!
To me, competition was only one aspect of the whole climbing thing because I started climbing outdoors.
Outdoor climbing was always what I enjoyed most, and after I'd won
practically everything, including the adult titles, I had to look for a new playing field, and I found it in alpine climbing.
These are exactly the challenges he wants and needs.
David has a very strong personality and he won't let anyone hold him back.
If he wants to do something, he will.

title: The Alpinist - Cerro Torre: A Snowball´s Chance in Hell - Ep.1

comments.text:
*The Alpinist - Cerro Torre*
Nach 3 Jahren und 5 Versuchen am Cerro Torre in Patagonien ist der Film 
über den österreichischen Ausnahmekletterer *David Lama* aus Tirol 
(Innsbruck) fertig gestellt!
Der junge Kletterer zählt zu den weltbesten Leadkletterern und hat auch bei 
fast allen Boulderbewerben bisher einen 1. Platz belegt.

#climbing   #klettern   #cerrotorre   #davidlama  ﻿
